keywords: ['classical orchestra', 'string section', 'timpanie', 'brass section', 'horn section', 'epic feel', 'no voice', 'instrumental', 'complex arrangement']
caption: This classical song features an orchestra playing a complex song. The string section plays the main melody. The horn section plays the bass harmony. The brass section plays the backing parts. The bass is played on a cello. At the beginning there is no percussion. Toward the end, the timpani is played as part of the percussion. The melody is complex. The mood of this song is epic and victorious. This song can be played in a successful bank robbery scene.
